title: Forest Operational monitoring using Copernicus and UAV hyperSpectral data
objective: FOCUS is a proposed H2020 project aimed at demonstrating an innovative extension of an existing forest monitoring service (www.silvisense.com) using a combination of Copernicus Sentinel-2 imagery with hyperspectral data captured by UAV platforms.
participants: VLAAMSE INSTELLING VOOR TECHNOLOGISCH ONDERZOEK N.V.;SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY AS
